A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie defeated the entire legacy of Star Wars. They turned Luke into a crazed child killer who doesn't  find his senses until the very end. Also\, Leia displays some questionable powers that I didn't even know existed based off of the previous 7 movies and the plot achieved nothing and didn't advance the story. Overall\, pathetic movie and might be worse than the Phantom Menace.
